attributes.action: Create a new service for children in care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A service that would stem from the NHS and Welfare. A service to be set up in a clinic environment where a thorough medical will be held on a regular basis i.e weekly, with the facility to have a child removed then and there if abuse has been detected.
A service that would be taken away from the 'Social Services' altogether.
